function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in household energy consumption due to extended periods of time spent at home during quarantine","Impact":"Higher risk of energy-related health issues and strain on energy resources","Mitigation":"Implement energy-efficient technologies and behavior changes to reduce energy usage","Technologies":"Smart energy strips, energy monitoring devices, LED bulbs, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Residents, occupants","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers"},{"Description":"Lack of energy independence during complete lockdown","Impact":"Vulnerability to closure and disruption of energy supply","Mitigation":"Install secure sources of heat, energy, and water for independent supply","Technologies":"Renewable energy sources, secure heating systems","People":"Residents, occupants","Owner":"Homeowners, building managers"},{"Description":"Inefficient energy consumption in unoccupied buildings during lockdown","Impact":"Wasteful energy consumption and strain on energy resources","Mitigation":"Implement stringent energy management policies and install energy-efficient systems","Technologies":"Building management systems, energy-efficient appliances","People":"Building managers, facility owners","Owner":"Building managers, facility owners"}]}
